name: A Crane's Gratitude
description:
One cold, winter day, a young girl stumbles upon a poor crane stuck in a trap. Out of the kindness of her heart, she frees the beautiful bird, and it flies away. That evening, a lost young man appears at her doorstep, seeking shelter from the snow.

And she lets him in without hesitation.

Inspired by the Japanese folklore - "Tsuru no Ongaeshi", this is a short game about two lonely people falling in love. Submission for the 2021 Winter Vn Jam.

- A protagonist with a customizable name.

- One romance route.

- Four different ways to interact with the romantic interest. (Bold, shy, assertive, passive.)

- Four different epilogues.

- 3 special CGs.

- First time game play time from around 20 ~ 25 minutes.




Writer, Programmer, Character and CG artist: Rinnie

Background artist: omurobo
